title: Rust Installation Guide
description: In this lab, you will need to install Rust using rustup, a command line tool for managing Rust versions and associated tools, by downloading it through an internet connection.

meta.title: Rust Installation Guide
meta.description: Learn how to install the Rust programming language using the rustup tool, a crucial step for mastering Rust development.
meta.keywords: rust playground, rust tutor, rust online compiler, installation, programming, rust commands, tutorial, rust practice, rust online playground, rust online
